## Articles

### [The History of the Data Economy](https://www.significancemagazine.com/business/714-the-history-of-the-data-economy)

The History of the Data Economy is a four part series from [Significance Magazine](https://www.significancemagazine.com/business/714-the-history-of-the-data-economy) and provides a good overview of how data became an important part of today's world, how it used, and a possbile future.

  - Part I: The birth of customer insight by Timandra Harkness [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01504)
  - Part II: Analytics arrives by Timandra Harkness [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01547)
  - Part III: The new kings and queens of data by Timandra Harkness [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01567)
  - Part IV: The future by Timandra Harkness [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1111/1740-9713.01586)
